title: Derek Gee and Brandon McNulty Confirm GC Promise with Top-10s at the Giro d’Italia
content:
How the North Americans fared: Beyond the headlines of Isaac del Toro, Derek Gee and Brandon McNulty both hit GC career-bests in the Giro d’Italia.

Read the full article at Derek Gee and Brandon McNulty Confirm GC Promise with Top-10s at the Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: ahood
